headline: Rockwell Automation (ROK): Assessing Valuation After $2B Wisconsin Expansion and Robust Q4 Growth
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (ROK) just announced it will build its largest manufacturing campus globally in Southeastern Wisconsin. This marks a major step in its ongoing $2 billion investment initiative spanning the next five years. See our latest analysis for Rockwell Automation. Big moves have certainly caught investors’ attention lately, with the recent $2 billion manufacturing campus announcement and robust fourth-quarter results helping build momentum. Rockwell Automation’s 1-year total...
